name: Gear Island
description:
You end up on a desert island and you wake up in a basecamp where the only thing you have is a chest and a tent. In the chest you will find the diary notes that someone left behind, explaining that this is not a normal island, that it has a mechanism that makes the island zones rotate in a random time.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • ENTER: Interact with chest and tent. Collect Items
  • E: Use item from inventory
  • SPACE: Jump
  • WASD: Move around
  • Numpad: Select an item from inventory

But there is hope for you. You can get out of the island finding the 5 items required to repair an abandonment ship.

--- UPDATE ---
